name: The Slim Reaper
description: Kevin Durant the "Slim Reaper" drawn in iconic Brooklyn Nets style. This vector portrait is drawn with iconic Coogi sweater inspired background from the Brooklyn legend Notorious B.I.G. Drawn in Adobe Illustrator by Graphic Artist Metaphorsy. | INSTAGRAM: @metaphorsy | TWITTER: @itsmetaphorsy | EMAIL:metaphorsy@gmail.com | WEBSITE: metaphorsy.com
